name: Angjoo Kanazawa, Assistant Professor
department: Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences
research: My research lies at the intersection of computer vision, computer graphics, and machine learning. We aim to develop a computational system that can continually learn a model of the world from visual observations, capturing, perceiving, and understanding the complex 4D world like humans can.
prospective_students: We are not taking visitors or students who are not at UC Berkeley at this time. For graduate or undergraduate students at UCB, please send an email with your interests, resume, and transcript. Preference is given to students who've taken CS184/284, CS194-26/294-26, CS280, and advanced math courses. Experience with Unity/Blender/Unreal is a plus.
